name: chores-monorepo
description: Family Chores Management App - Full-stack monorepo

scripts.test:all: echo 'ğŸ§ª Running all tests...' && pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: echo 'ğŸ”§ Backend Tests:' && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.test:frontend: echo 'ğŸ¨ Frontend Tests:' && pnpm --filter frontend test -- --watchAll=false --passWithNoTests
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'ğŸš€ E2E Tests:' && pnpm --filter frontend run cypress:run
scripts.test:e2e:open: echo 'ğŸ‘€ E2E Tests (Interactive):' && pnpm --filter frontend run cypress:open
scripts.test:coverage: echo 'ğŸ“Š Test Coverage Reports:' && pnpm run test:coverage:backend && pnpm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: echo 'ğŸ”§ Backend Coverage:' && pnpm --filter backend test -- --coverage
scripts.test:coverage:frontend: echo 'ğŸ¨ Frontend Coverage:' && pnpm --filter frontend test -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.test:full: echo 'ğŸ¯ Full Test Suite:' && pnpm run test:coverage && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter backend run typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend run typecheck
